title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch**

**Unleash Your Adventure**

Take your outdoor pursuits to the next level with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. This rugged and feature-packed watch is designed for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders who demand the best.

**Solar Charging Capabilities**

Stay powered up for as long as you need with unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode, thanks to the watch's solar charging capabilities. Even in GPS mode, you can get up to 48 hours of battery life with continuous solar charging.

**Surfing Features**

Catch every wave with the Instinct 2 Solar's surfing features, including:

* Wave counter
* Maximum speed tracking
* Distance tracking
* Tide data

**Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Features**

Take your windsurfing and kiteboarding to new heights with features like:

* GPS position tracking
* Speed measurement
* Distance measurement
* Heart rate monitoring
* Elevation data for jumps

**Compatibility and Preloaded Activity Profiles**

Stay connected with:

* Surfline Sessions compatibility
* Smart notifications
* Connect IQ compatibility

Plus, get preloaded activity profiles for:

* Running
* Biking
* Swimming
* Strength training

**Navigation and Health Monitoring**

Navigate with confidence using the watch's:

* 3-axis compass
* Barometric altimeter
* GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems

Stay on top of your health with features like:

* Heart rate monitoring
* Sleep tracking
* Pulse Ox (limited availability)
* Respiration tracking
* Stress tracking

**Physical Specifications**

Built to last, the Instinct 2 Solar features:

* 100-meter water rating
* Thermal resistance
* Shock resistance
* Fiber-reinforced polymer case material
* Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass

**Size and Other Features**

With a 45mm case size, this watch is designed for comfort and convenience. Plus, enjoy additional features like Garmin Pay (not available on this model).

**Order now and take your outdoor adventures to the next level!**

**Product Listing:**

**Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch**

**Unleash Your Adventure**

Stay connected and powered up with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. This rugged and versatile watch is designed for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders, offering a range of features to enhance your outdoor experience.

**Solar Charging Capabilities**

Enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of direct sunlight (50,000 lux) per day. In GPS mode, get up to 48 hours of battery life with continuous solar charging.

**Surfing Features**

* Wave counter: Track your waves and ride the tides
* Maximum speed tracking: Know your top speed
* Distance tracking: Measure your journey
* Tide data: Stay informed about the ocean's rhythms

**Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Features**

* GPS position: Know your location
* Speed tracking: Monitor your velocity
* Distance tracking: Measure your journey
* Heart rate monitoring: Stay on top of your fitness
* Elevation data for jumps: Track your aerial stunts

**Compatibility and Connectivity**

* Surfline Sessions: Access surf reports and forecasts
* Smart notifications: Stay connected with friends and family
* Connect IQ: Customize your watch with apps and widgets
* (Note: Garmin Pay is not available on this model)

**Preloaded Activity Profiles**

* Running
* Biking
* Swimming
* Strength training

**Navigation**

* 3-axis compass: Find your direction
* Barometric altimeter: Track your elevation
* Satellite systems: GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo for accurate navigation

**Health Monitoring**

* Heart rate monitoring: Track your pulse
* Sleep tracking: Monitor your rest and recovery
* Pulse Ox: Measure your blood oxygen levels (limited availability)
* Respiration tracking: Monitor your breathing rate
* Stress tracking: Stay on top of your mental well-being

**Physical Specifications**

* Water rating: 100 meters
* Thermal resistance: Withstand extreme temperatures
* Shock resistance: Built to withstand rough handling
* Case material: Fiber-reinforced polymer
* Glass type: Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass

**Size**

* 45 MM case size

Get ready to take your outdoor adventures to the next level with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. Order yours today!

Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch

**Product Description:**

Take your outdoor adventures to the next level with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. This rugged and feature-packed watch is designed for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders who demand the best.

**Solar Charging Capabilities:**
Stay powered up all day with solar charging capabilities that provide unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of direct sunlight (50,000 lux) per day. In GPS mode, get up to 48 hours of battery life with continuous solar charging.

**Surfing Features:**

* Wave counter: Track your waves and optimize your surf sessions
* Maximum speed tracking: Know your top speed on the water
* Distance tracking: Monitor your distance traveled
* Tide data: Stay informed about the tides and plan your sessions accordingly

**Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Features:**

* GPS position: Track your location and route
* Speed measurement: Monitor your speed and distance
* Heart rate measurement: Stay connected to your body's rhythms
* Elevation data for jumps: Track your aerial stunts and progress

**Compatibility:**

* Surfline Sessions: Integrate your surf sessions with Surfline's platform
* Smart notifications: Stay connected to your phone and receive notifications on your wrist
* Connect IQ: Customize your watch with third-party apps and widgets

**Preloaded Activity Profiles:**

* Running
* Biking
* Swimming
* Strength training

**Navigation:**

* 3-axis compass: Stay oriented in the wilderness
* Barometric altimeter: Track changes in elevation
* Satellite systems: GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo for accurate location tracking

**Health Monitoring:**

* Heart rate monitoring: Track your heart rate and rhythm
* Sleep tracking: Monitor your sleep patterns and quality
* Pulse Ox: Track your blood oxygen levels (limited availability)
* Respiration tracking: Monitor your breathing rate and rhythm
* Stress tracking: Stay on top of your mental and physical well-being

**Physical Specifications:**

* Water rating: 100 meters
* Thermal resistance: Withstands extreme temperatures
* Shock resistance: Built to withstand rough handling
* Case material: Fiber-reinforced polymer
* Glass type: Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass

**Size:** 45 MM

**Other Features:**

* Garmin Pay (not available on this model)

**Order now and take your outdoor adventures to new heights!**
